snippet: The appellate division of the New York State Supreme Court dismissed a lawsuit at the heart of a bitter dispute between the billionaire collector Ronald O. Perelman and the art dealer Larry Gagosian.
abstract: The appellate division of the New York State Supreme Court dismissed a lawsuit at the heart of a bitter dispute between the billionaire collector Ronald O. Perelman and the art dealer Larry Gagosian.

headline.main: Perelman's Lawsuit Against Gagosian Is Dismissed
